name: Bella
description: Bella is a tiny bundle of energy! At just 4 months old, she loves chasing feather toys and climbing scratching posts. She needs a home with lots of playtime.

medicalHistory.healthNotes: Too young for spaying yet. Needs booster shots in 4 weeks.

name: Charlie
description: Charlie is a gentle giant. He has large paws and an even bigger heart. He loves to lounge on the sofa and watch birds out the window.

medicalHistory.healthNotes: Healthy weight, but watch portion sizes.

name: Luna
description: A sleek and mysterious 6-month-old kitten. Luna is a bit shy at first but becomes a purring machine once she trusts you. Perfect for a quiet home.

name: Simba
description: Simba lives up to his nameâ€”he is the king of the house! He is very vocal, loves food, and is always looking for a lap to sleep on.

medicalHistory.healthNotes: Recent dental cleaning completed. Teeth look great.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy has a colorful coat and a sassy personality. She is independent but loves to greet you at the door when you come home from work.

name: Oreo
description: Oreo is always dressed for a formal occasion. He is very smart, knows how to open doors, and gets along great with other cats.

name: Nala
description: Nala is a 5-month-old beauty with striking blue eyes. She is very talkative and will follow you around the house telling you about her day.

medicalHistory.healthNotes: Slightly underweight, on kitten food diet.

name: Milo
description: Milo goes completely limp when you pick him up. He is the ultimate cuddle buddy and has never scratched anyone in his life.

medicalHistory.healthNotes: Excellent health. Coat requires weekly brushing.

name: Coco
description: Coco is a senior lady looking for a retirement home. She requires daily brushing for her magnificent coat and prefers a calm environment without loud noises.

medicalHistory.healthNotes: Mild arthritis in back legs, takes supplements.

name: Loki
description: Loki is full of mischief! He is high-energy, loves water, and needs an owner who can keep up with his active lifestyle.

name: Willow
description: Willow is quiet, observant, and loyal. She bonds deeply with one person and will be your constant shadow.

medicalHistory.healthNotes: Prone to anxiety in new places.

name: Ginger
description: It is rare to find a female orange cat, but Ginger is one of a kind! She is the neighborhood mom and loves taking care of kittens.
